title: Himi 208
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Kapau ‘e kātoa,
‘A e kau kāinga,
‘I he ‘ao ‘o Sīsū
‘I he loto ‘ofa
Ko e tuli ki he lelei,
‘Oku fakalaumālie.
2.
’Oka fakataha
‘A e toko ua
Pe toko tolu pē,
‘I hono huafa
Pea tufa ia ki ai,
‘A e ngaahi tapuaki.
3.
Ko ‘ene kelesi
Ko e fu’u koloa
‘Oku foaki mai
Ki he kau kātoa
Ko e kakai ‘o Saione
‘Oku kumi ki hēvani. *
